 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחַק‎</span> **verb** ==be, or become, far, distant== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian especially adjective <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rû‡u***</u></abbr>, ***far***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***choice wine*** (i.e. from a distance) [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>158</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be far***, Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחק‎</span> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, nos. 95, 98</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְחֵיק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְחַק‎</span>, and (often in derived species and derivatives) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Isa.59.9|Isa 59:9]]; [[Lam.1.16|Lam 1:16]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְחַק‎</span> [[Deut.12.21|Deut 12:21]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחֲקִי‎</span> [[Isa.54.14|Isa 54:14]], masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחֲקוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.11.15|Ezek 11:15]] &lt; ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָֽחֲקוּ‎</span> [[BDB#Ra|Ra]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְחֹק‎</span> [[Ps.103.12|Ps 103:12]]; [[Eccl.3.5|Eccl 3:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרָֽחֳקָה‎</span> [[Ezek.8.6|Ezek 8:6]] — ***be far, distant:*** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person, of place [[Deut.12.21|Deut 12:21]]; [[Deut.14.24|Deut 14:24]], of person, = neglect, abandon, [[Prov.19.7|Prov 19:7]], especially in Psalms, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Ps.22.12|Ps 22:12]]; [[Ps.22.20|Ps 22:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person omitted), [[Ps.35.22|Ps 35:22]]; [[Ps.38.22|Ps 38:22]]; [[Ps.71.12|Ps 71:12]] of utter absence, or non-existence [[Lam.1.16|Lam 1:16]], compare [[Isa.49.19|Isa 49:19]] (absolute), subject justice [[Isa.59.9|Isa 59:9]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשִּׂיג‎</span>), compare v[[Isa.59.11|Isa 59:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַיִן‎</span>), subject blessing [[Ps.109.17|Ps 109:17]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲצַת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְשָׁעִים‎</span> [[Job.21.16|Job 21:16]]; [[Job.21.18|Job 21:18]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> person (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), of Israel (figurative) [[Jer.2.5|Jer 2:5]], compare [[Ezek.44.10|Ezek 44:10]] = ***far from*** (land of) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ezek.11.15|Ezek 11:15]] (see above; [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> location [[Ezek.8.6|Ezek 8:6]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local (east from west) [[Ps.103.12|Ps 103:12]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of thing (figurative): <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרָֽתְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.119.150|Ps 119:150]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרב‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיֶּשַׁע‎</span> [[Job.5.14|Job 5:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעשֶׁק‎</span> [[Isa.54.14|Isa 54:14]], compare [[Prov.22.5|Prov 22:5]] = ***wholly abstain from*** [[Exod.23.7|Exod 23:7]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), so (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> infinitive) [[Eccl.3.5|Eccl 3:5]] absolute of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s righteousness, with reference to time [[Isa.46.13|Isa 46:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אחר‎</span>; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרב‎</span>). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְחַקחֹֿק‎</span> [[Mic.7.11|Mic 7:11]] ***boundary shall become distant***, i.e. territory be enlarged (? corrupt, compare [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירחק חֶבֶל הַכֶּסֶף‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]] ***be removed ?*** [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרָתֵק‎</span> ***be joined ?*** [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἀνατραπῇ</span>, [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***rumpatur***, compare [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]], read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָּתֵק‎</span> Pfannk [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex.</sup> **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִחַק‎</span> [[Isa.6.12|Isa 6:12]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, ***send far away***, accusative of person; of people, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבּוֺ ר‎</span> [[Isa.29.13|Isa 29:13]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִחַקְתָּ‎</span> [[Isa.26.15|Isa 26:15]] ***thou hast far extended*** (with accusative) all the ends (boundaries) of the land; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַחֲקוּ אֶתוְֿנוּתָם‎</span> [[Ezek.43.9|Ezek 43:9]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְחִיק‎</span> [[Job.19.13|Job 19:13]]; [[Ps.103.12|Ps 103:12]], 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְחַקְתִּים‎</span> [[Ezek.11.16|Ezek 11:16]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְחִיקֶנָּה‎</span> [[Prov.22.15|Prov 22:15]], 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְחִיק‎</span> [[Job.22.23|Job 22:23]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְחֵק‎</span> [[Prov.4.24|Prov 4:24]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְחַ֑ק‎</span> [[Job.13.21|Job 13:21]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְחִיקֵהוּ‎</span> [[Job.11.14|Job 11:14]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְחֵק‎</span> [[Gen.21.16|Gen 21:16]] +, ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְחִיק‎</span> [[Jer.27.10|Jer 27:10]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְחִיקָם‎</span> [[Joel.4.6|Joel 4:6]] — 

**1.** direct causation ***make***, or ***exhibit, distance, be gone far***, subject person: [[Gen.44.4|Gen 44:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[Josh.8.4|Josh 8:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.18.22|Judg 18:22]] followed by infinitive construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָלֶכֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְחֵק לֹא תַר‎</span> [[Exod.8.24|Exod 8:24]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare [[Ps.55.8|Ps 55:8]], Infinitive absolute as adverb = ***at a distance*** [[Gen.21.16|Gen 21:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[Exod.33.7|Exod 33:7]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.3.16|Josh 3:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְאֹד מִן‎</span>, [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; &gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מן‎</span>). 

**2.** indirect causation ***remove, put far away***, with accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> of land [[Jer.27.10|Jer 27:10]], compare [[Joel.4.6|Joel 4:6]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> person [[Job.19.13|Job 19:13]] and (accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצְּפוֺנִי‎</span>) [[Joel.2.20|Joel 2:20]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person [[Ps.88.9|Ps 88:9]]; [[Ps.88.19|Ps 88:19]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּגּוֺיִם‎</span> [[Ezek.11.16|Ezek 11:16]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּף‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> person [[Job.13.21|Job 13:21]], with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> + ***id.*** [[Prov.5.8|Prov 5:8]] with accusative of sin + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person [[Prov.4.24|Prov 4:24]]; [[Job.11.14|Job 11:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person omitted); [[Prov.22.15|Prov 22:15]]; [[Prov.30.8|Prov 30:8]]; [[Ps.103.12|Ps 103:12]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> local [[Job.22.23|Job 22:23]]. 



 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רחק‎</span> (√ of following; see Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רחק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רָחוֺק‎</span>).
